nodes.text: Lava meerkats inhabited Nevarro by 9 ABY. During their escape from the forces of Imperial warlord Moff Gideon, the bounty hunter Din Djarin and his companions encountered the meerkats on the banks of an underground lava river. Later, a member of the species began to follow Carasynthia Dune after she rescued it from being eaten by a group of Aqualish robbers.
